tool_description: An API showing the latest plastic related news from around the world by fetching it through three different newspaper resources
name: API-Plastic Alert
title: API-Plastic Alert

api_list.name: Get individual news source news_copy
api_list.description: Gets news about plastic from a specific news resource.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://api-plastic-alert.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "api-plastic-alert.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://api-plastic-alert.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "api-plastic-alert.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all plastic related news
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back  news about plastic from all over the world.
